page.title: 16Guineapigs and Health Care
page.content: Queen Victoria Hospital is best known for the work pioneered in its world famous Burns Unit particularly during the war.The servicemen treated there were nicknamed the Guinea Pigs and their Association still meets regularly in East Grinstead. In addition to the health care available at the hospital, the National Health Clinic and St.Catherines Nursing Home, the area is served by 15 dentists and 11 general practitioners. There are 2 chiropodists, 3 opthalmic opticians and 4 dispensing chemists. Alternative medicine is offered by a registered osteopath and an acupuncture practitioner practising oriental medicine.There are also several Health Food Shops selling a range of whole foods and herbal remedies.
